name: Turbocat Saves the Internet
description:
Help Turbocat save the internet from the 4chan hacker!

Turbocat has been called from his planet to save the internet from the evil 4chan hacker! Follow Turbocat as he battles evil dogs, takes on computer viruses, enters /b/, and destroys the 4chan hacker!

For Lets Players: Yes, you can use the game in a lets play without fear of copywrite infringement or anything. All music was under the creative commons license. You may want to consider showing the credits page to make sure the creators of the songs and so forth get their fair credit, but I can't make you (and neither can they).
